patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,13 @@
+ACCELERATE	AE K S EH L ER EY T
+BELT	B EH L T
+BRAKE	B R EY K
+CRUISE	K R UW Z
+DRIVE	D R AY V
+HELD	HH EH L D
+PARK	P AA R K
+PRESSED	P R EH S T
+REVERSE	R IH V ER S
+REVERSE(2)	R IY V ER S
+SEAT	S IY T
+SET	S EH T
+START	S T AA R T
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,71 @@
+Language model created by QuickLM on Sat Feb 27 03:01:21 EST 2021
+Copyright (c) 1996-2010 Carnegie Mellon University and Alexander I. Rudnicky
+
+The model is in standard ARPA format, designed by Doug Paul while he was at MITRE.
+
+The code that was used to produce this language model is available in Open Source.
+Please visit http://www.speech.cs.cmu.edu/tools/ for more information
+
+The (fixed) discount mass is 0.5. The backoffs are computed using the ratio method.
+This model based on a corpus of 9 sentences and 14 words
+
+\data\
+ngram 1=14
+ngram 2=21
+ngram 3=13
+
+\1-grams:
+-0.8381 </s> -0.3010
+-0.8381 <s> -0.2329
+-1.7924 ACCELERATE -0.2329
+-1.7924 BELT -0.2329
+-1.4914 BRAKE -0.2868
+-1.7924 CRUISE -0.2329
+-1.7924 DRIVE -0.2329
+-1.7924 HELD -0.2329
+-1.7924 PARK -0.2329
+-1.7924 PRESSED -0.2329
+-1.7924 REVERSE -0.2329
+-1.7924 SEAT -0.2940
+-1.7924 SET -0.2940
+-1.7924 START -0.2329
+
+\2-grams:
+-1.2553 <s> ACCELERATE 0.0000
+-0.9542 <s> BRAKE 0.0000
+-1.2553 <s> DRIVE 0.0000
+-1.2553 <s> PARK 0.0000
+-1.2553 <s> REVERSE 0.0000
+-1.2553 <s> SEAT 0.0000
+-1.2553 <s> SET 0.0000
+-1.2553 <s> START 0.0000
+-0.3010 ACCELERATE </s> -0.3010
+-0.3010 BELT </s> -0.3010
+-0.6021 BRAKE HELD 0.0000
+-0.6021 BRAKE PRESSED 0.0000
+-0.3010 CRUISE </s> -0.3010
+-0.3010 DRIVE </s> -0.3010
+-0.3010 HELD </s> -0.3010
+-0.3010 PARK </s> -0.3010
+-0.3010 PRESSED </s> -0.3010
+-0.3010 REVERSE </s> -0.3010
+-0.3010 SEAT BELT 0.0000
+-0.3010 SET CRUISE 0.0000
+-0.3010 START </s> -0.3010
+
+\3-grams:
+-0.3010 <s> ACCELERATE </s>
+-0.6021 <s> BRAKE HELD
+-0.6021 <s> BRAKE PRESSED
+-0.3010 <s> DRIVE </s>
+-0.3010 <s> PARK </s>
+-0.3010 <s> REVERSE </s>
+-0.3010 <s> SEAT BELT
+-0.3010 <s> SET CRUISE
+-0.3010 <s> START </s>
+-0.3010 BRAKE HELD </s>
+-0.3010 BRAKE PRESSED </s>
+-0.3010 SEAT BELT </s>
+-0.3010 SET CRUISE </s>
+
+\end\
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,14 @@
